resources.string: Please, enable bluetooth to get app working!
Sorry, no bluetooth adapter on your device
App error! Try to refrash activity
New bounded devices can be added by clicking the button below
Connection is already started, please wait
No bounded devices, add them in settings by clicking the button below

Use this app to connect to your robotic devices. If the list of available devices is empty, go to the settings by clicking the assigned button, make new connection. Only one device is available for connection, to start connection tap on your device. Data transfer is carried out using the protocol available at the link: \nhttps://drive.google.com/file/d/15m_IHMHJuL50GD7ED1wr0oiJYxRY-aMS/view?usp=sharing. \nThe application was created as part of the course work of Maxim Kolpakov in 2021.
